at0000.1.description: A framework to communicate information that has been captured and curated in anticipation of future need for care.

en.purpose: To record the patient's preferred locations of care, in the context of long-term condiitons or end of life care, and other special requests.

at0030.1.description: Any other specifc personal request or preference, including cultural or religious preferences.

at0030.2.description: Any other specifc personal request or preference, including cultural or religious preferences.

at0030.3.description: Any other specifc personal request or preference, including cultural or religious preferences.

at0030.4.description: Any other specifc personal request or preference, including cultural or religious preferences.

at0029.1.description: Any additional comments about the subject's place of care preferences.

at0000.1.description: The subject's preferred priorities of care and 'What matters'.

at0003.1.description: The patient's preferred place of care (first choice).

at0030.5.description: Any other specifc personal request or preference, including cultural or religious preferences.

en.purpose: To record additional composition metadata aligned with IHE-XDS which is not already available from the Reference Model COMPOSITION class.
en.use: Use to add IHE-XDS aligned metadata to a COMPOSITION.context, which along with existing COMPOSITION attributes, allows the composition to be registered in an IHE-XDS environment.

de.purpose: Zur Dokumentation von Metadaten zu multimedialen klinischen Daten, die nicht im Multimedia-Datentyp erfasst werden.
de.use: Zur Dokumentation von Metadaten zu multimedialen klinischen Daten, die nicht im Multimedia-Datentyp erfasst werden.

nb.purpose: For å registrere metadata om en multimediarepresentasjon av kliniske data som ikke er dekket av kun datatypen Multimedia.
nb.use: Brukes for å registrere ytterligere metadata om en multimediarepresentasjon av kliniske data som ikke er dekket av kun datatypen Mulitmedia.

pt-br.purpose: Para gravar detalhes de metadados sobre uma representação multimídia dos dados clínicos não capturados usando o tipo de dado de multimídia sozinho.
pt-br.use: Usado para gravar metadados adicionais sobre uma representação multimídia do dado clínico que não é capturado usando o tipo de dado multimídia sozinho.

en.purpose: To record details about text, audio, images, animations, video and interactive content generated or acquired during the provision of healthcare.
en.misuse: Not to be used to represent multimedia content that is supplied to an individual or carer during the provision of healthcare - use CLUSTER.multimedia_supply for this purpose.

at0000.1.description: A multimedia resource that is generated or acquired during the provision of healthcare.

at0000.1.description: A framework to communicate the preferences of an individual for future medical treatment and care.

at0038.1.description: Additional narrative about the advance care directive not captured in other fields.

at0006.1.description: Narrative description of the overall advance care directive.
at0006.1.comment: May be used to record a narrative overview of the complete advance care directive, which may or may not be supported by structured data. Details of specific structured findings can be included using CLUSTER archetypes in the 'Directive details' slot. This data element may be used to capture legacy data that is not available in a structured format.
